title: THIEF PUZZLE
description: Master stealth and strategy in Thief Puzzle - become the ultimate stealth master in this captivating 2D puzzle game! In Thief Puzzle, you dive into a world of mischief and tactical gameplay. Take control of a thiefâ€™s hand, guiding it through intricate levels to snatch the prized possessions. Each level presents a new puzzle where you must cleverly navigate around obstacles and outwit security measures to reach your target. With every successful heist, the challenges grow, testing your skills to think outside the box and act like a true master thief. So grab your mask and start your cunning journey in Thief Puzzle today!
